channel.title: Comments on: Epic Poem, 1-year-old today 566 reads.Tragedy and Hope #GrubStreetJournal #GrubStreetPoetry #ConquestofDough
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: Roger Lewis
item.dc:creator: Roger Lewis
item.description: My first and lasting reaction to your poems was, "Wonderfu. Here is a poet who can engage with the pressing and vital conerns of our times. As did Blake in his time. While others were still trilling away abojut rural idyls and flute playing shepherds Blake took those forms and images and confronted the brutalities of his age with an art renewed. In your own way Roger is doing the same." David Malone, Golem xiv blog
item.content:encoded: My first and lasting reaction to your poems was, “Wonderfu. Here is a poet who can engage with the pressing and vital conerns of our times. As did Blake in his time. While others were still trilling away abojut rural idyls and flute playing shepherds Blake took those forms and images and confronted the brutalities of his age with an art renewed. In your own way Roger is doing the same.” David Malone, Golem xiv blog
